title: The Arrangement 12: The Ferro Family
description: THE SERIES WITH OVER A MILLION COPIES SOLDVolume 12 in the New York Times Bestselling Arrangement Serials***Warning Sexual Content***There is so much blood that I can't think. The night goes from bliss to chaos in a matter of moments.As the truth begins to unravel, it's clear that I can't trust anyone, except Sean Ferro. The same man that threatens to destroy me could also be my salvation--and I could be his. Genre: New Adult RomanceThis story unfolds over multiple volumes approx. 125 pages each.~The Arrangement Vol 1-12 are on sale now.~
author: H.M. Ward
